I told them that the thing does not end here. Today, in the council of ministers another bombing is coming.
A blow against fraud and corruption. A blow in favor of transparency.
A great leap forward so that our institutions have a technical and not political management.
I do not say more. The announcement will come from my new finance secretary.
After a summer break, the regular Council of Ministers has started again today. The Council will meet more often for the 2013 budget in coming weeks.

I wish everybody a good holiday. We made the Bayram prayers in a big congregation in the Blue Mosque.
It is possible to see people of every color in the mosque, where there are many Muslims from other countries. http://t.co/vr4mzp1j
We celebrated the whole congregation after prayer ..
Then in the imam; pretzels, cheese and tea We had the first breakfast after Ramadan. http://t.co/s8fwl7sm
On our return home we were full and we also had a cab holiday. http://t.co/s5rbv7uo

The children of the local holiday did not leave us alone again. http://t.co/yrxhk82l

The Paralympic Games will open from the 29th. From Japan, players who have overcome various obstacles, including 64-year-old table tennis players, will participate in this competition once every four years. I would like to send my sincere respect and great encouragement to the players' continued efforts and success

The Paralympic Games is said to have originated the archery tournament held at Stoke Mandeville Hospital in the suburbs of London after the London Olympics in 1948. Commercial Paralympic Games is also wonderful CM, I am looking forward to the opening of the event. http://t.co/E9e9aME7

The President of the Republic expressed regret that the Lebanese abductees were unable to spend the funerals with their families and went to the leaders of the friendly countries to make efforts to launch them.
At the same time, he denounced the kidnapping of Syrian and Turkish nationals, an act that does not help but hampers official efforts, as well as harming Lebanon's reputation.
The competent judicial authorities are required to move and issue the necessary instructions on the subject of kidnapping and other security issues that have occurred previously and get today,
The security authorities are required to move and work to free the abductees
The manifestations seen by the Lebanese in recent days and the provocations and defiance of the state and feelings are rejected
San Gabriel, Suchitepéquez was declared free of illiteracy. #Guatemala #ottoperezmolina http://t.co/J3oGupp0
More than 16 thousand Salvadoran tourists enjoyed their August vacations in Honduras. They did not have any incident of insecurity. Zero!
It is worth repeating the good news: With more security, there is more tourism; With more tourism, there is more employment. Go ahead, Honduras! Keep going so!
